## About me

I´m an undergraduate student of genomic Sciences at the National Autonomous University of Mexico. I'm broadly interested in pharmaceutics, drug discovery  and pharmacogenomics. Currently I´m applying bioinformatics to understand the effects of smoking and nicotine on the developing brain.
